page.title: 06HOUSE AND HOME
page.content: There are lots of different kinds of houses in Forest Town.There are the Avenues. The houses are quite big inside but the things that are not so good about them is the outside and the garden.The garden is not very big and it backs into someone elses garden. These do not cost so much.For someone who likes a bit bigger house and garden the Larkhills are ideal.The Larkhills have three or four bedrooms and have a large garden.The Oak Tree Lane Estate is quite new.They have three or four bedrooms and nice garden. In Forest Town there are schools which take children from ages 3 to 18.There is one Catholic school in Forest Town. {DAVID CHAMBERS , LEE RHOADES
